DOC.brief_title: Air Versus Saline Solution Localization Epidural Space Labour Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: A local ethic committee approve study . A statistical power calculation perform 177 patient per group necessary confirm 20 % difference efficacy block 30 minute ( α=0,05 ; β=0,1 ) . Epidural catheter insert standardized analgesic protocol initiate . The efficacy block assess 30 minute delivery . The apparition adverse effect puncture labour annotate . The need repuncture block repercussion technique delivery fetus record well . At 24 hour , investigator assess incidence pain site puncture ( PSP ) level maternal satisfaction 0 to10 numeric scale .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Parturients ask epidural analgesia labour . Age 18 45 year . Spontaneous induced . Cervical dilatation inferior 6 cm . Written informed consent . Exclusion criterion : Infection puncture site . Refusal patient . Coagulopathy . Severe hypovolaemia . Intracranial hypertension . Severe aortic mitral stenosis . Systemic infection . Non collaborate patient . Incapacity communicate lack comprehension study parturient Prior neurological symptom demyelinising lesion . Valvular stenosis . Severe spinal deviation . Patient previously operate spinal surgery site puncture .
